title: Flow State: When Attention Becomes Effortless
description: One-minute skill: Flow State: When Attention Becomes Effortless.

hook.text: Hours vanish. You look up and the project is done. What happened?

buildup.text: Csikszentmihalyi described flow as total absorption in a challenging task.

discovery.text: Flow requires a balance: the task must be hard enough to engage but not overwhelm.

twist.text: Anxiety and boredom sit on either side‚Äîflow lives in the narrow sweet spot.

climax.text: In flow, the brain's default mode network quiets and focus sharpens naturally.

quiz.question: What condition is essential for entering a flow state?
options: A balance between challenge and skill level
